sentence.Network_en: Rachis - removing could increase grain weight, while defoliation could lower grain weight.
sentence.Network_cn: 剪库增加粒重, 而剪源则降低粒重.

sentence.Network_en: Spadix rachis flat, margin with bract - like appendages; flowers small, monoecious, in 2 series on rachis, apetalous.
sentence.Network_cn: 肉穗花序轴扁平, 边缘有苞片状附属物; 花小, 单性,雌雄同株, 呈2列排列于花序轴上, 无花被.

...型叶。幼叶拳卷，长大后伸展平直，并分化为叶柄和叶片两部分。叶片有单叶或一回到多回羽状分裂或复叶，叶片的中轴称为叶轴(rachis)，第一次分裂出来的小叶称为羽片(pinna)，羽片的中轴称为羽轴(pinna rachis)，从羽.
个别花的柄叫花梗(柄) (Pedicel),整个花枝的轴称总花轴(Rachis)。 1. 按照结构形式,可以分为: (1) 穗状花序(Spike)花多数 ,无柄 ,排列于一不分枝的主轴.

a particularly vigorous form from Yunnan , N Myanmar , and N Thailand has been separated as Eulalia birmanica . this has long , straight rachis internodes subequaling spikelet .上发生来自云南的特别有力的形式，这近相等有长，直的轴节间小穗。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: modern Latin, from Greek rhakhis 'spine'. The English plural -ides is by false analogy

means.word_mean: 1. axis of a compound leaf or compound inflorescence
2. the series of vertebrae forming the axis of the skeleton and protecting the spinal cord;
